title: 3rd sem ECE lab exam
content: I had my ACD lab exams 2 weeks back and I did not get proper output. So will they give me zero marks??

comments.body: I think you'd get atleast half your score if you've written the writing part and the circuit diagram

Totally depends on the professor, the 5 credits courses are out of 120 and scaled down to 100 so the lab marks don’t come out on your pesu results (assignment section)
It’s a black box, you never know , just do well in your esas and hope for the best :)
